RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 47. Maiden Claiming Purse 7700. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOT TAKE pressed the pace shaking clear in upper stretch holding firm to wire. ADRIANA ES BONITA laid close up being dispatched by the winner in upper stretch holding well to the end. GOT MORE back early saved ground closing well late. SHISH KABOB pressed the pace weakening in upper stretch. ONE MORE SISTER raced wide playing no factor. JANSELLE was never involved. NIKITA close early faded to upper stretch. ROMANCE PELUSA trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Got More
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early, saved ground, closed well late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CRACK THE MOON vied three wide, moved clear, ridden out. OVERHAUL pressed pace between horses and proved second best. HOPPERNESS wide early and rallied late for the show. SCREAMING JEREMY pressed pace from the inside and tired late. SOUTHPOINT ran evenly throughout. F F READY OR NOT was never a factor. DR SILBERMAN trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Silberman
ENTRY.OWNER: Chapman James K and Stuart Tsujimoto LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Crack the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied three wide, drove clear late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $6,500 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOREST SELECTION vied two wide early, drove clear, drifted late, driving. CANT GLIDE BY KATZ was back early, came wide, rallied late for the place. NO MORE stalked the early pace, moved to challenge and was in tight late. FIFTY PESOS raced evenly throughout. PITMAN disputed early pace and gave way late. OLD FORTY FIVE trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Pitman
ENTRY.COMMENT: disputed early pace and gave way

ENTRY.NAME: No More
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, moved to challenge, in tight late

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Glide by Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: was back early, came wide, rallied late for the place

ENTRY.NAME: Forest Selection
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied two wide , drifted late, driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 1, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JUNGLE GODDESS drove to early lead and held sway late. ORBETTE settled early, rallied late to just miss. SUGAR BRITCHES up close early, held show late. CROSSTOWN GIRL raced midpack early but lacked rally. YESTERDAYSPLAN trailed early and was never a threat. UNDETECTED no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Jungle Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: drove to early lead and held late

ENTRY.NAME: Orbette
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early, rallied late to just miss

ENTRY.NAME: Yesterdaysplan
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early and was never a threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 1, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREE SPEECH dueled from the inside early , put away foe at the top of the stretch and won easily. BOATSWAIN trailed early, moved wide around the turned and rallied for the place. PROFESSIONAL was reserved early rallied mildly for the show. WHISKEY SUNRISE saved ground to the stretch and finished evenly. ZAINO BOYZ disputed the early pice and gave way readily. BOO BE RIGHT was up close early and tired late. EPIC WEST was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Free Speech
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside early, put away foe top of stretch, easily

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the stretch, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Boatswain
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, moved wide around the turn, second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REJOICE vied for the early lead, drew off around the turn and won easily. INGERSOLL dueled for the eary lead, battled back for the place. GOLQUIST bumped early, rallied wide and just missed place. XIT NOW dueled early and tired. EDUARD steadied early , never a threat. CONFIDENT N ELITE was never a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Ingersoll
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, battled for the place

ENTRY.NAME: Xit Now
ENTRY.OWNER: Ciampi Louis and Bernardini Jay P

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 14200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 1 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Est imating Allowances) (Preference To Highest Earnings In 2022-2023).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOO LEGIT up close early, saved ground , won driving. CATES SWOOSH stalked 5 wide and rallied for the place. AUGER was close up early, got up for show. AWESOME MINER disputed the early pace but weakened late. GOTTAGETITBACK was midpack early and lacked rally. HIDING THE BRICK was reserved eary , came very wide and gained ground late. ARAZI LIKE MOVE was far back eary but made good ground late. AW ITE dueled for the early lead and tired. SAVAGE NATION tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Arazi Like Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: was far back early, going good late

ENTRY.NAME: Too Legit
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close early, saved ground, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Hiding the Brick
ENTRY.COMMENT: was reserved early , very wide rally

ENTRY.NAME: Aw Ite
ENTRY.OWNER: Inman Betty Tunstall Shirley and Tunstall James

ENTRY.NAME: Auger
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up early, got up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Cates Swoosh
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked five wide, rallied for the place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 1, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 1 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligi bility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEND THE KNEE broke sharply setting a clear pace throughout holding firm to wire. GOLDEN ACCOUNT slow early rallied on the turn surging late to save place. VICTOR STORY off slowly lagged through the tun rallying down the lane to finish well. CATLIKE chased the pace to upper stretch weakening late. WESTLODGE INTRIGUE hustled along pursued close up through the turn tiring down the lane. ONE SMART COOKIE faded on the turn. CYBERBURG raced evenly through the turn giving way in upper stretch. CHARM WEAVER was always outrun. BELLA BASORA showed little racing wide. BLUEGRASS CANDY outrun early tired. PER RULING FROM THE WEST VIRGINIA RACING COMMISSION, BEND THE KNEE WAS DISQUALIFIED FOR POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Victor Story
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, lagged through tun, responded late inside

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Bend the Knee
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, held firm

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Account
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied turn, came on for place

ENTRY.NAME: Westlodge Intrigue
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, pursued close up turn, wore out lane
